inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script is run. Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: PAT
inputs.label: Personal Access Token (PAT)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Personal Access Key (PAT) to use to access the API

inputs.name: booleanValue
inputs.label: Boolean checkbox in the task
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is a helper information to set up the task field

inputs.name: chunkSize
inputs.label: File upload chunk size (in MB)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Large files are uploaded in pieces. Use this to specify a chunk size. Must be an integer

inputs.name: filePathValue
inputs.label: File path to the file
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to the file for upload in chunks

inputs.name: datePublished
inputs.label: Published date for the something (format: yyyy-MM-dd). Default: today
inputs.helpMarkDown: The date when something happened. Defaults to today

inputs.name: changelog
inputs.label: Optional. The Changelog text for the example version with each entry in a new line.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. The Changelog text for the example version with each entry in a new line.
